channel.title: Hello i got a question about no-clip
channel.description: some peeps tring to cheat with no-clip i want to make a command that if they try they get banned , or there client crashes plz give me both thanks for ur support lovya guys one big community ! PS IAM USING DELTA.

item.title: Hello i got a question about no-clip
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

Powerknite7, I am not good with DeltaScape but I am a bit expirienced with it and I am know it well, I have just wrote up a 1-minute code, please post ANY errors, this is untested sorry.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights > 0) { disconnected = true; } else { writeLog(playerName, "bans"); disconnected = true; } }

This is only if you want them to be banned, and if they are moderator or higher they do not get banned, only disconnected. If they are a normal player, they get banned and disconnected.

Read full topic
item.source: Hello i got a question about no-clip

item.title: Hello i got a question about no-clip
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

[quote=“powerknite7, post:1, topic:279986”]some peeps tring to cheat with no-clip
i want to make a command that if they try they get banned , or there client crashes plz give me both
thanks for ur support
lovya guys
one big community !
PS IAM USING DELTA.[/quote]

if (command.startsWith("noclip") && playerRights == 0) { disconnected = true; } }

this makes them disconnect

Read full topic
